Package gears.sidescroller.world.tiles

package gears.sidescroller.world.tiles
Tiles serves as part of the static environment of the game world. A TileMap uses the Flyweight design pattern to render tiles and manage their collisions. Future versions will add support for rendering sprites for tiles.
See Also:
  • gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractTileTemplate
    Tiles are immobile, immutable squares on a map.
    BasicColorTile
    The BasicColorTile is my classic lazy tile design: a square with an outline.
    ImageTile
    The ImageTile is a tile which renders an image, trimmed to fit on the tile.
    TileGenerator
    The TileGenerator class is used to create randomly colored BasicColorTiles.
    TileJson
